SimpleHttpServer - Class in org.apparatus_templi
A simple web server that acts as both a middle man between the Coordinator and any front ends, as well as a host for the bundled web front end.
SimpleHttpServer(int) - Constructor for class org.apparatus_templi.SimpleHttpServer
Start the web server bound to the loop-back interface on the given port number.
SimpleHttpServer(int, boolean) - Constructor for class org.apparatus_templi.SimpleHttpServer
Start the web server bound to the loop-back interface on the given port if possible, optionally binding to a different port if the given port number is not available.
SimpleHttpServer(int, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class org.apparatus_templi.SimpleHttpServer
Start the web server on the given port number if available, optionally binding to either the loop-back interface or the localhost interface, optionally attempting to find the next available port number if the port specified is not available.
